user_query: I need to plan a business trip to New York City. Can you give me the current weather conditions in NYC and provide a 5-day forecast? Additionally, I would like to know if there are any active weather alerts for the New York City area.

TaskList.description: Fetch the current weather conditions for New York City.
Fetch the 5-day weather forecast for New York City.
Check for any active weather alerts for the New York City area.
